column1: Content and Client Experience Narrative Strategist
column2: Your Role and Responsibilities The Content and Client Experience Strategy team creates and curates content and experiences that articulate and amplify a compelling, differentiated, and consistent narrative about how IBM and our ecosystem of partners create value for our clients, educate them about our technology and consulting expertise, and ultimately drive IBM business growth. The team ensures that our messaging at events and experiences (e.g., Innovation Studios) is: aligned to IBM's GTM strategy to deliver on business growth delivered in fresh and engaging formats that foster strong emotional connections and a deep understanding of IBM can be scaled with consistency and relevancy across markets As a narrative strategist, you will focus on cultivating a deep understanding of the market, our clients, and IBM's differentiated value. The ideal candidate will pull that understanding into well researched points of view around how IBM technology and expertise deliver value across various themes, industries, and business imperatives. You will also work to create unique narratives for priority IBM events and client experiences that curates and customizes our IBM story for a particular target audience, including their pain points, motivations, and information needs. You further must galvanize and align all stakeholders, with varying levels of seniority, on the singular narrative and ensure all content and experiences reinforce our overarching story to deliver impactful messages that resonates with our target audience.  This role will work closely with experts across the company including product and content marketing, communications, offering management, sales, and others, to build on their expertise and drive consensus to ensure our content and experience aligns with our business goals and messaging. In addition to the narrative, you will create additional content (e.g., keynotes, discussion guides, panel Q&A, speaking session storyboards/flows, speaking scripts, session titles and abstracts, booth copy and signage, etc.) and provide recommendations on other client-facing assets (e.g., case studies, videos, demos, etc.). You will also collaborate closely across the broader team to to bring to life the event themes in new and memorable ways and to measure and analyze content performance to continuously improve our content and experience strategies and achieve business objectives. If you are a talented storyteller with a passion for technology and a desire to drive business growth, you are encouraged to apply for this exciting opportunity! Required Technical and Professional Expertise 5+ years of experience in strategy, consulting, and/or across marketing disciplines (events, product, content, etc.)  Proven experience in content creation, storytelling, or copywriting, preferably in a B2B technology environment Ability to bring an outside-in perspective through a deep understanding of the market, with a particular emphasis on the portfolio that IBM serves Ability to synthesize components into a cohesive narrative with differentiated messaging and powerful storytelling  Stellar critical & analytical thinking skills combined with exceptional written and communication skills, with the ability to craft engaging narratives that resonate with our target audience Adaptable and comfortable with a fast-paced, dynamic, rapidly changing environment Strong collaborator and a team-oriented mindset  Deep enthusiasm and curiosity about understanding the role of technology in the business world and a strong passion to advocate and champion for technology's role by helping others to better understand it Ability to interact with senior management and influence decision makers Ability to work independently with excellent time management skills and be a self-motivated individual Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise Creative thinker with a passion for storytelling and curiousity for new technologies and trends Advanced project management skills and experience with the ability to manage multiple projects and priorities simultaneously (3+ years) MCCJBID

column2: Principal Medical Writer (India) (FSP) At Thermo Fisher Scientific, you will discover meaningful work that makes a positive impact on a global scale. Join our colleagues in bringing our Mission to life - enabling our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner, and safer. We provide our teams with the resources needed to achieve individual career goals while taking science a step beyond through research, development, and delivery of life-changing therapies.  With clinical trials conducted in 100+ countries and ongoing development of novel frameworks for clinical research through our PPD clinical research portfolio, our work spans laboratory, digital and decentralized clinical trial services. Your determination to deliver quality and accuracy will improve health outcomes that people and communities depend on now and in the future. Summarized Purpose: We are excited to expand our India Medical Writing FSP Team! We are looking for a Principal Medical Writer to be dedicated to a client in the FSP space; experience in Immunology, Oncology or Vaccines would be valuable but not essential.  As a Principal Medical Writer you will provide high-quality medical and scientific writing from planning and coordination through delivery of final drafts to internal and external clients. As the lead writer, you will review documents for the team and provide training and guidance to junior team members. As a subject matter expert you will provide advice on document development strategy, regulations, and industry best practices. You will collaborate with internal and external clients, supporting and enabling effective and efficient communication that results in operational excellence. Essential Functions: Researches, writes, and edits clinical study reports and study protocols, and summarizes data from clinical studies. May serve as primary author who writes and provides input on complex clinical and scientific and program level documents, including IBs, INDs, and MAAs. Provides senior level review of routine and complex documents. Provides training and mentorship for other writers and program managers on document preparation, the use of software for document development, document types, regulatory requirements, and therapeutic area knowledge. Ensures compliance with quality processes and requirements for assigned documents. As the subject matter expert, develops and reviews best practices, methods, and techniques for achieving optimal results, including various client- specific processes, and leads process improvement initiatives. May also develop, review, and manage performance metrics for assigned projects. Represents the department at project launch meetings, review meetings, and project team meetings. Education and Experience: Bachelor's degree in a scientific discipline or equivalent and relevant formal academic / vocational qualification; Advanced degree preferred Previous experience that provides the knowledge, skills, and abilities to perform the job (comparable to 8+ years). Experience in managing and directing complex medical writing projects required Experience working in the pharmaceutical/CRO industry preferred Submissions document experience advantageous Additional qualifications in medical writing (AMWA; EMWA; RAC) advantageous Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities: Significant knowledge of global, regional, national, and other document development guidelines In-depth knowledge in one or more specialty areas such as preclinical, therapeutic, regulatory, submissions, communications, etc. Excellent data interpretation and medical writing skills, including grammatical, editorial, and proofreading skills Excellent project management skills Advanced interpersonal, oral, and written communication, and presentation skills Excellent negotiation skills Excellent judgment; high degree of independence in decision making and problem solving Ability to mentor and lead junior level staff.

column2: AI Content Developer (Book Production & Metadata Focus) The Challenge:  In the rapidly evolving world of digital publishing, readers expect not just accurate content, but an immersive and accessible experience across devices and platforms. You'll play a vital role in making that happen, ensuring our books not only look beautiful but are easily discoverable by the right readers. Key Responsibilities: Content Creation & Transformation:  Go beyond basic text editing. You'll adapt existing books for digital formats, create engaging layouts, and integrate interactive elements where applicable to enhance the reader's journey. Design for Impact:  Use your mastery of Adobe Suite, Corel Draw, and PageMaker to optimize image quality, typography, and overall file preparation for digital presses. Your work directly influences the reader's first impression of our books. Quality Champion:  Collaborate with editors and proofreaders to ensure absolute accuracy across text, image, and formatting before a book goes live. You are the final line of defense against errors that disrupt the reading experience. Project Partner:  Coordinate with production teams for a seamless publishing process. Proactively communicate progress, anticipate potential delays, and offer solutions that balance quality with tight deadlines. Metadata Powerhouse:  Contribute to and maintain our content management system with meticulous attention to metadata. Your understanding of keywords, categories, and bibliographic information is key to maximizing each book's visibility online. Desired Candidate Profile: Formal Foundation:  A bachelor's degree in graphic design, media production, or a related field demonstrates your commitment to the craft. Book Production Experience:  Proven experience specifically in adapting books for digital formats is crucial, showcasing your understanding of eBook readers, varying screen sizes, and platform-specific requirements. Technical Virtuoso:  Your proficiency in Adobe Suite, Corel Draw, and PageMaker allows you to execute creative visions while adhering to technical specifications for flawless file delivery. Detail-Oriented Multitasker:  You have an eagle-eye for detail, spotting inconsistencies across text and multimedia elements, all while expertly juggling several projects at once. Understanding the Metadata Landscape:  Your grasp of Production Metadata Management goes beyond buzzwords. You know how to optimize titles, descriptions, and classifications to connect our books with their ideal audience. Bonus: Coding Edge:  Familiarity with XML, HTML, and CSS will empower you to customize content and contribute to our digital publishing infrastructure in even more impactful ways.

column2: Nature of Job:    Remote       Job Desc:            Overview          We are actively looking for a highly creative and talented Transcreator with experience in writing for a global audience in English. The work is a long-term project centered around the Guru Granth Sahib. The successful candidate must demonstrate proven experience in creating content assets. The transcreator will need to maintain the meaning, grammar and message as presented in the Panjabi while maintaining the poetic tone of the original text. The transcreator will work closely with the translator and revise the translator s work for global parlance. The transcreator must thoroughly understand the context of a given material which includes the project process and methodology. Ultimately, the transcreator will provide ready-to-use translated content that will support the Sikh Research Institute s (SikhRI) strategic initiatives and help reach a broader audience.          Hours          This is a full-time position contracted with SikhRI. The following list is representative of the duties and responsibilities, but not limited to and are subject to modification at the discretion of the supervisor.          Typical Duties            Read given material and research industry-specific terminology      Cross-reference specialized dictionaries and translation tools to check the quality of transcreation      Revise the English language translation to bring out the creative interpretive elements      Ensure translated content conveys the original meaning and tone by evaluating the translation in the parlance of both languages      Proofread the translated and the transcreated texts for grammar, spelling and punctuation accuracy      Follow up with internal team members to ensure translation meets their needs      Edit content with an eye toward maintaining its format (e.g. font, structure, and process adhered)      Network with field experts to stay current on new translation tools and practices            Qualifications            Fluent in written & spoken English; fluency in written and spoken Panjabi preferred      Proven work experience as a Translator or similar role for 5 years      Along with proficiency in reading, translating and/or interpreting Guru Granth Sahib text, analytical and evaluative skills.      Excellent proofreading skills with the ability to identify grammar, spelling and punctuation errors      Good knowledge of content editing tools & techniques      Ability to work in a large team setting with multiple workflow functions      Additional certification in Linguistics is a plus      Subject knowledge and oral/written communication skills to discuss and document research progress      Ability to work independently, accurately and to problem solve technical and methodological issues that arise during the delivery      Technology proficiency in Microsoft (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and Google collaboration suite (Drive, Docs, Sheets, Meets)      A Master s degree or a Research Degree in Translation studies (having worked in translation for Panjabi to English language or vice versa) or in comparative literature; knowledge in ethnolinguistics will be an added advantage            Compensation            Competitive salary based on the level of experience and industry standards for this role

column1: Senior Executive - Content, Growth and Monetization
column2: We are looking for a driven and creative Content Growth and Monetization (YT,FB,Snap) Specialist who will be responsible for developing strategies to grow our presence and monetize content on Facebook and Snapchat.          The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of social media platforms, content trends, and audience behavior. This role requires a combination of analytical skills, creativity, and business acumen to drive growth and revenue.           What will you do?           Content Growth -    Develop and implement content growth strategies for Facebook and Snapchat platforms to increase audience engagement, reach, and followership. Identify and explore new monetization opportunities on Facebook and Snapchat, including advertising, sponsored content, partnerships, and other revenue streams.       Content Analysis -    Analyze content performance metrics, audience insights, and market trends to identify opportunities for optimization and growth. Provide regular reports and insights on content performance, audience demographics, and revenue metrics to internal stakeholders.        Optimization Strategy -    Optimize content distribution tactics such as posting frequency, timing, and targeting to maximize reach and engagement. Monitor and evaluate key performance indicators (KPIs) to assess the effectiveness of content strategies and make data-driven recommendations for improvement.       Stakeholder Management    - Collaborate with cross-functional teams including content creators, marketing, and sales to develop integrated strategies for content distribution and monetization. Build and maintain relationships with platform representatives, influencers, and industry contacts to enhance collaboration and stay ahead of trends.       Industry Trends -    Stay up-to-date with the latest features, algorithms, and best practices on Facebook and Snapchat to drive innovation and competitive advantage.             YouTube CMS              Channel Growth -       Develop and execute strategic plans for all partner managers within the YouTube CMS to maximize channel growth and revenue generation.       Channel Analysis    - Monitor and analyze channel performance metrics, including views, subscribers, engagement, and revenue, to identify opportunities for improvement.       Financial Management and Policy Compliance -    Manage monthly invoicing process, ensuring accurate and timely payments to content creators and partners. Handle claims related to copyright, monetization, and other issues, following YouTube s policies and procedures.       Partner Manager Collaboration -    Conduct regular meetings with partner managers to review channel performance, discuss strategies, and address any concerns or challenges. Provide guidance and support to partner managers, offering advice on content optimization, audience engagement, and monetization strategies.       Industry Trends    - Stay informed about industry trends, best practices, and changes to YouTube s policies and algorithms, and incorporate relevant insights into content strategies.         Who should apply for this role?       Candidate with 4+ years of proven experience in digital media, content management, or YouTube CMS & Facebook channel management.     Individuals with strong understanding of YouTube and Facebook content policies, monetization guidelines, and CMS functionalities.     Excellent analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.     Effective communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and build strong relationships with content creators and partners.     Detail-oriented and highly organized, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.     Strategic thinker with a proactive mindset, capable of developing innovative solutions to achieve business objectives.

column2: Skill required:Content Management - Content Moderation  Designation:Management Level - Associate  Job Location:Hyderabad  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:1 to 3 years  What would you do? Accenture is a trusted, innovative, comprehensive, and experienced partner to leading platform companies. The Trust and Safety offering within Accenture Operations helps keep the internet safe and helps platform companies accelerate, scale, and improve their businesses. Content moderators serve as an important line of defence by helping improve the quality and safety of online content while gaining hands-on job experience. You will deliver value to our clients, while making a larger impact on society. You will be responsible for analysing and reviewing user profiles, audio, videos, and text-based content and/or investigating, escalating and/or resolving issues that are reported by users or flagged by the system. Due to the nature of the role, the user may be exposed to flashing lights or contrasting light and dark patterns Content moderation is meaningful work that helps keep the internet safe. It may also be challenging, at times. In the context of this role, individuals may be directly or inadvertently exposed to potentially objectionable and sensitive content (e.g., graphic, violent, sexual, or egregious). Therefore, content moderators need strong resilience and coping skills. We care for the health and well-being of our people and provide the support and resources needed to perform their job role responsibilities. Active participation in Accenture's well-being support program, designed specifically for the Trust & Safety community, provides valuable skills to promote individual and collective well-being.  What are we looking for? Strong coping, emotional resilience, and stress-management skills  Ability to perform duties objectively, devoid of inherent biases or personal beliefs, in the best interest of client policies  Strong attention to detail  Comfort synthesizing and analyzing information from multiple streams  Strong critical thinking and decision-making skills  Basic internet research skills Good comprehension, communication (verbal, written) skills is required to interpret content  Be a team player and value cohesiveness  Be flexible to cater to changing business needs in a fast-paced environment  Be aware of social trends, political situations, current affairs etc. Bachelor's degree in a relevant field pref. in English, Mass Communications Exposure to Generative AI technology, natural language processing, and machine learning concepts. Excellent attention to detail with the ability to analyze and evaluate content effectively. Strong communication/comprehension skills and the ability to provide clear and constructive feedback. Proficiency in written and verbal communication in the target language(s) for content validation and generation. Familiarity with content moderation policies, guidelines, and best practices Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to adapt to evolving requirements. Content creation or moderation exp Awareness of ethical considerations and the ability to apply them in content moderation and generation processes. Familiarity with different social media platforms Roles and Responsibilities Review, classify and/or remove content according to client guidelines, using specific tools and channels  Understand and make decisions/take actions as per client policies and guidelines  Stay up to date with any changes on policies/process  Investigate, resolve, and relay complex content issues to the broader Trust and Safety team  Identify improvement opportunities in workflow and suggest solutions to improve quality and overall efficiency of the process  Participate in continuous training programs and workgroup discussions for optimal development in the role  Engage in conversation around socially sensitive topics with the purpose of keeping our communities safe  Engage in the well being activities  Meet desired efficiency established by business  Validate and rate generated content for accuracy, relevance, and quality based on predefined guidelines and criteria. Identify and report any content that violates guidelines or policies, including issues related to inappropriate language, hate speech, violence, or other forms of abuse. column2: Job Description Snapshot   Position : Content Writer  (Technology)    CTC : 3-5 Lac pa   Location : Noida  (Delhi NCR)    Building a product nation  I believe products bring real value and want to see India become a Product Nation.  Not IT Services,  not BPO powerhouse,  but an export house of scalable technology products.  I want the world to use off-the-shelf scalable software products made and handcrafted in India.     But it s not going to be easy.  We need to change our thinking,  ask difficult questions,  and come up with insane ideas.     For example,  I believe that all forms of transportation will become redundant one day,  making our lives much more efficient.  Our descendants will laugh at the idea that we actually drove our cars everyday to the other part of the town to be able to complete our work.  Sounds insane or exciting?    Getting the word out  To make a Product Nation,  the simple first step is a product.     And we built our first one.  Customers from about 114 countries are using it to connect their customers from offline print media to online content.     Scanova is a QR Code Management tool that allows businesses to create,  design,  manage,  and track QR Code-based interactions.     Scanova is a great product.  But how do we get the word out? How do we get people to notice us?   So we started blogging about it.  A lot.  And people did notice us.  We get about 100, 000 page views per month.     But you ll agree that s not enough.  We need to reach a million people  (or even a billion?)  if we are to build a great product company.  And for that,  we need you.      Building the right team  To achieve this vision,  I am looking for a team that believes in what we do and is hungry for challenges.  We are not looking for employees but hardcore problem-solvers.     Specifically,  we are looking for a  Content Writer  (Technology)  ,  who will be required to:    Content Generation    Research and brainstorm with team for topic ideas relevant to the target audience   Write full length blog articles  (300-1500 words)  for the company blog  ( http:/ / scanova. io/ blog )  following best practices of content marketing and SEO   Write answers on Quora for topics related to the business   Create posts for the company s social media platforms including Facebook,  Twitter,  Google ,  and LinkedIn   Conduct secondary and primary research to enhance quality of articles   Create images for articles using online tools such as Canva   If required,  develop content for website,  email newsletters,  and PR    Content Management    Operate and manage Wordpress CMS   View and report data via Google Analytics    Content Distribution    Schedule posts on social media platforms using management tools such as Buffer   Remain up-to-date on best Wordpress SEO practices to ensure higher rankings in search engines   Having the right skills  Passion and endurance are a must.  But we also expect a few other core competencies:   Excellent command over written and spoken English language   2 years of professional content writing experience  (online or print)    Good understanding of latest content-related SEO best practices   Basic understanding of CMS such as Wordpress and image editing tools  (Photoshop,  Canva,  Illustrator,  Sketch)    Should be passionate about technology and active in reading   Should be active on social media platforms other than Facebook/ Whatsapp   Hunger to make a dent in this world  We take care of each other  This is not just a team.  It s a family.  And in a family,  we take care of each other.  Here is what you get for being a part:    Salary - CTC 3-5 lac per annum   Medical insurance   Opportunity to work in a small team that empowers you to make your own decisions   Opportunity to become a specialist in Inbound Marketing   Opportunities to socialize and make friends - the team will be co-working at  Unboxed  in Noida  (Delhi NCR)    A little more about us  We call ourselves Trycon Technologies.  It was started in 2013 by Gautam Garg,  Mukesh Gupta,  and Swapnil Jain - all alumni of Delhi College of Engineering  (2010 & 2011 batch) .     After college we worked for a couple of years in companies like Grail Research,  Adobe,  and Oracle.  But like you,  we wanted more from life.  Not just money but freedom.  Freedom to use our potential and freedom to make a real dent in this world.  So we quit our jobs and came together in late 2013.     We are not alone.  Hyderabad-based Utthishta Seed Fund saw our progress and invested in us in 2015.     This is our story.  Let s meet up so that we can learn yours.  And always remember this:    The biggest risk is not taking any risk.  In a world that's changing really quickly,  the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks - Mark Zuckerberg,  2011       Gautam Garg   Cofounder,  Scanova   Email:  gautam@scanova. io   Mob: 91-9999242705

column2: Job Title: Listings  Content Writer  As an Amazon Listings Content Writer, your primary responsibility is to create  compelling and persuasive product descriptions, titles, and bullet points that effectively  communicate the features, benefits, and unique selling points of the products being sold on  the Amazon platform. Your role involves optimizing listings for search visibility and  conversion, ensuring that they are informative, engaging, and accurately represent the  products. Key responsibilities:  Writing Product Descriptions:  Crafting concise and persuasive product descriptions  that highlight key features, specifications, and benefits in a way that resonates with  the target audience.   Creating Engaging Titles:  Developing attention-grabbing and keyword-rich titles that  accurately reflect the product and improve search visibility.   Crafting Bullet Points:  Creating succinct and impactful bullet points that outline the  most important features, benefits, and selling points of the product.   Keyword Research and Optimization:  Conducting keyword research to identify  relevant terms and phrases that potential customers are likely to use when searching  for products similar to those you're listing. Incorporating these keywords  strategically into the content to improve search rankings and visibility.   Optimizing Content for Conversion:  Writing persuasive copy that encourages  customers to take action, such as making a purchase or adding the product to their  cart. This may involve highlighting special offers, promotions, or unique selling  propositions.  Ensuring Accuracy and Compliance:  Ensuring that all information provided in the  listings is accurate, up-to-date, and compliant with Amazon's guidelines and policies.  Collaboration:  Collaborating with other teams such as product management,  marketing, and sales to gather necessary information and insights for creating  effective content.     Monitoring and Optimization : Monitoring the performance of product listings and  making data-driven optimizations to improve visibility, conversion rates, and overall  sales performan c e. Staying Updated:  Keeping abreast of industry trends, best practices, and changes in  Amazon's algorithms and policies to continuously refine and improve listing  strategies. Quality Assurance:  Conducting regular reviews and audits of existing listings to  ensure consistency, accuracy, and adherence to brand guidelines.   Qualifications: Bachelor Degree or certification in Content Writing or related field. Minimum 3+ years of relevant experience in ecommerce industry is mandatory. Knowledge of Amazon A+, creatives, social media posts. Good communication skills and ability to work in a team. Perks and benefits Competitive Salary & benefits

column2: Content marketing managers are responsible for content marketing. Content marketing includes managing the blog,  sales page copywriting,  email communications,  drip marketing campaigns,  a little bit of PR,  ebook publications,  video marketing and guest blogging. Content marketing managers report to digital marketing managers or the head/ VP of marketing. Content marketing managers can be solo contributors or they can manage a team of content writers. More often than not,  content writers who report to content marketing managers are freelancers who write content by working from their home or as a part time job. Content marketing managers will earn anywhere between 10- 15 lakhs per annum on average. The experience required for such position is 3- 5 years. Again,  there is no clear requirement for qualification. Having digital marketing certifications and an MBA can help if your projects do not showcase your content marketing expertise. However if you have a project that speaks for itself,  certifications and degrees are not necessary.

column2: The Content Writer is responsible for creating engaging, informative, and high-quality content that resonates with the target audience and supports the organizations goals. They will produce a variety of content types across different platforms, including articles, blog posts, social media posts, website copy, email newsletters, and more. The Content Writer will collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop content strategies and ensure consistency in messaging and brand voice.              Responsibilities:            Content Creation:    Write clear, concise, and compelling content for various platforms and formats, including articles, blog posts, social media updates, website copy, emails, case studies, whitepapers, Sales-kit, emailer, newsletters, presentation.        Research:    Conduct thorough research on industry-related topics, trends, and keywords to generate ideas and gather information for content creation.        Content Planning:    Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content calendars and schedules aligned with marketing campaigns, product launches, and other initiatives.        SEO Optimization:    Optimize content for search engines by incorporating relevant keywords, meta tags, and other SEO best practices to increase organic visibility and drive traffic.        Editing and Proofreading:    Review and edit content for clarity, grammar, spelling, style, and tone to ensure accuracy and adherence to brand guidelines.        Content Distribution:    Coordinate with the social media team, email marketing team, and other stakeholders to distribute content across appropriate channels and maximize reach and engagement.        Content Promotion:    Develop strategies to promote content through social media, email newsletters, influencer partnerships, guest blogging, and other channels to increase visibility and audience engagement.        Audience Engagement:    Monitor comments, feedback, and engagement metrics on published content to understand audience preferences and sentiments and adjust content strategies accordingly.        Stay Updated:    Keep abreast of industry trends, content marketing best practices, and emerging technologies to continuously improve content quality and effectiveness.        Performance Tracking:    Analyze content performance metrics such as traffic, engagement, conversion rates, and ROI to evaluate the effectiveness of content strategies and identify areas for improvement.                Requirements:          Bachelors degree in English, Journalism, Communications, Marketing, or related field.      Proven experience as a Content Writer or similar role, with a strong portfolio of published writing samples.      Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills, with impeccable grammar and attention to detail.      Creativity and the ability to generate original ideas and compelling storytelling.      Strong research skills and the ability to gather information from diverse sources to support content creation.      Understanding of SEO principles and experience with keyword research and optimization.      Proficiency in content management systems (CMS) and basic knowledge of HTML and CSS.      Familiarity with social media platforms and content distribution channels.      Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment, managing multiple projects with tight deadlines. column2: A content creator is an individual or entity that produces and shares various forms of content across different platforms      Content creation involves the development and delivery of engaging and informative material that resonates with a specific target audience      Here are some key aspects of being a content creator:Content Strategy: Content creators develop a strategy that aligns with their goals and target audience      This involves defining the purpose, tone, and format of the content, as well as determining the platforms and channels where it will be distributed      Content Development: Content creators generate original and compelling material such as articles, blog posts, videos, podcasts, infographics, social media posts, and more      They may conduct research, interview experts, or gather information from reliable sources to create valuable and relevant content      Writing and Editing: Content creators possess strong writing and editing skills to produce high-quality content      They ensure that the content is well-structured, coherent, error-free, and optimized for readability and search engines if applicable      Visual and Multimedia Production: Depending on the medium, content creators may also be involved in creating visual elements such as images, graphics, or videos      They may need to have skills in graphic design, video editing, or audio production to enhance the quality and visual appeal of their content      Audience Engagement: Content creators strive to engage their audience by creating content that addresses their interests, concerns, and needs      They encourage comments, respond to feedback, and actively participate in discussions to build a loyal community around their content      Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Content creators often employ SEO techniques to improve the visibility of their content in search engine results      They optimize their content with relevant keywords, meta tags, and other SEO practices to attract organic traffic and increase reach

column2: Skill required:Content Management - Content Moderation  Designation:Management Level - New Associate  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:0 to 1 years  What would you do? The Software and Platform vertical helps the world's leading platform companies accelerate, scale and improve their businesses as their most trusted, innovative, comprehensive and experienced partner. The Content Management team is responsible for organizing, categorizing and publish content and information using specific tools and channels, for use by different groups and individuals within the organization. The Content Moderation team focuses on reviewing photos, videos, and text-based content and make judgments as to whether reviewed content is in violation of our Client's terms of services. They review content that may be sensitive in nature. They ensure every piece of content in violation of the client's terms of services is accurately identified and flagged for action in a timely manner.  What are we looking for? English  Ability to work well in a team  Adaptable and flexible  Agility for quick learning  Ability to meet deadlines Accenture is a trusted, innovative, comprehensive, and experienced partner to leading platform companies. The Trust and Safety offering within Accenture Operations helps keep the internet safe and helps platform companies accelerate, scale, and improve their businesses. Content moderators serve as an important line of defence by helping improve the quality and safety of online content while gaining hands-on job experience. You will deliver value to our clients, while making a larger impact on society. You will be responsible for analysing and reviewing user profiles, audio, videos, and text-based content and/or investigating, escalating and/or resolving issues that are reported by users or flagged by the system. Due to the nature of the role, the user may be exposed to flashing lights or contrasting light and dark patterns. Content moderation is meaningful work that helps keep the internet safe. It may also be challenging, at times. In the context of this role, individuals may be directly or inadvertently exposed to potentially objectionable and sensitive content (e.g., graphic, violent, sexual, or egregious). Therefore, content moderators need strong resilience and coping skills. We care for the health and well-being of our people and provide the support and resources needed to perform their job role responsibilities. Active participation in Accenture's well-being support program, designed specifically for the Trust & Safety community, provides valuable skills to promote individual and collective well-being Roles and Responsibilities:  In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines  Your primary interaction is within your own team and your direct supervisor  In this role you will be given detailed instructions on all tasks  The decisions that you make impact your own work and are closely supervised  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team with a predetermined, narrow scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts As an Agent, you are responsible to  Review content- user profiles, videos, texts, images etc  Investigate and apply client policies  Escalate and/or resolve the issue that is reported by users or flagged by the system Note- The reported content could be sensitive or of graphic nature DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES Your role requires following responsibilities  Review, classify and/or remove content according to client guidelines, using specific tools and channels  Understand and make decisions/take actions as per client policies and guidelines  Stay up to date with any changes on policies/process  Investigate, resolve, and relay complex content issues to the broader Trust and Safety team  Identify improvement opportunities in workflow and suggest solutions to improve quality and overall efficiency of the process  Participate in continuous training programs and workgroup discussions for optimal development in the role  Engage in conversation around socially sensitive topics with the purpose of keeping our communities safe  Engage in the well being activities  Meet desired efficiency established by business SKILLS REQUIRED DEFINITION The following skills are required to perform this role-  Strong coping, emotional resilience, and stress-management skills  Ability to perform duties objectively, devoid of inherent biases or personal beliefs, in the best interest of client policies  Strong attention to detail  Comfort synthesizing and analyzing information from multiple streams  Strong critical thinking and decision-making skills  Basic internet research skills Good comprehension, communication (verbal, written) skills is required to interpret content Add- any additional language requirement OTHER SKILLS Additional skills-  Be a team player and value cohesiveness  Be flexible to cater to changing business needs in a fast-paced environment  Be aware of social trends, political situations, current affairs etc
